docs.snippet: If there be any of your readers unfortunate enough to see our Saturday Review, they may be surprised to find that I am still in existence, after the terrific mauling which I received in that eminent periodical. Yes, Sir! thanks to the cautious care...

headline.main: LONDON NEWS.; Our Correspondent, the Saturday Review, and Mr. Thackeray Mr. Murray's New Edition of Pope Retirement of the Editor of the Quarterly Review Split in the Tory Camp Dr. Mackay's New Journal The British Lion The Late Robert Brough The Great American Book-Sale Books in Preparation Lord Elphinstone, &c., &c.

docs.lead_paragraph: If there be any of your readers unfortunate enough to see our Saturday Review, they may be surprised to find that I am still in existence, after the terrific mauling which I received in that eminent periodical. Yes, Sir! thanks to the cautious care of kind friends, who locked all my razors out ...

docs.snippet: My last letter was written you from Old Point Comfort. I am again at home, and would have renewed my correspondence ere this, but for the excellent racy Baltimore letter emanations, as I presume, from your "Special," who accompanied the Great ...

docs.snippet: Judge BUEL died at his residence in Troy, on Thursday night, aged 76 years. For more than a  generation, says the Troy Daily Whig, Judge BUEL has been one of the best known and highly esteemed citizens of Troy.
docs.lead_paragraph: Judge BUEL died at his residence in Troy, on Thursday night, aged 76 years. For more than a generation, says the Troy Daily Whig, Judge BUEL has been one of the best known and highly esteemed citizens of Troy.

docs.snippet: The People ex rel. James H. Jerome vs. The Commissioners of Emigration.?The case of Dr. Jerome, which was recently before Justice LEONARD at Chambers of the Supreme Court, was now decided in a lengthy opinion.

headline.main: LAW REPORTS.; The Mandamus Against the Commissioners of Emigration. DR. JEROME TO BE PAID.

docs.snippet: The Pony Express arrived here last night with California dates to the 4th inst., Honolulu to July 19, and Hong Kong to June 15.

headline.main: GENERAL TELEGRAPHIC NEWS.; FROM THE PACIFIC. ARRIVAL OF THE OVERLAND EXPRESS. Advices from California The Sandwich Islands and China.

docs.lead_paragraph: The Pony Express arrived here last night with California dates to the 4th inst., Honolulu to July 19, and Hong Kong to June 15.

docs.snippet: Archbishop Hughes is rusticating in Canada. On Sunday last he preached in St. Michael's Cathedral, Toronto.
docs.lead_paragraph: Archbishop Hughes is rusticating in Canada. On Sunday last he preached in St. Michael's Cathedral, Toronto.

docs.snippet: Newport is at present in the height of its glory. The "season" will reach its culminating point about the 15th, but for at least a month after that time, beauty, wealth and fashion will link the days into rosy series of gaiety and enjoyment.
docs.lead_paragraph: Newport is at present in the height of its glory. The "season" will reach its culminating point about the 15th, but for at least a month after that time, beauty, wealth and fashion will link the days into rosy series of gaiety and enjoyment.
